table.name: inputTable
table.label: Input Table
table.description: Pick the input table to apply kmeans.

image.name: inputLabel
image.label: Input Labelmap
image.description: Pick the input labelmap to cluster the segments.

integer.name: inputK
integer.label: Number of clusters (k)
integer.description: Pick the number of clusters for K-Means.

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output
image.description: Pick the output volume to the algorithm.
